posts.post_title: FS/FT Raw T206 Joss Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
For Sale/Trade...

Raw T206 Addie Joss Polar Bear back. 

[url]https://www.flickr.com/gp/153696493@N02/N4z032[/url]

Creasing and SLIGHT paper loss (due to creasing I would assume) on the back near the "r" in Bear. 

Asking $60 OBO. Would also consider trading for a SGC graded T206 HoFer or SGC graded Pre-War HoFer.
